    • Method Detail

      • isCausallyConsistent

        @Nullable
public Boolean isCausallyConsistent​()
        Whether operations using the session should causally consistent with each other.
        Returns:
        whether operations using the session should be causally consistent. A null value indicates to use the the global default, which is currently true.
        MongoDB documentation
        Causal Consistency
